title: TaxiReservation
description: A reservation for a taxi.\n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations. For offers of tickets, use [[Offer]].

pickupTime.description: When a taxi will pick up a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.

pickupLocation.description: Where a taxi will pick up a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.

partySize.description: Number of people the reservation should accommodate.
